description: This issue or pull request already exists
name: duplicate

description: Required for the deliverable to be a success
name: prio 1: must have

description: Optional in the delivery - not expected
name: prio 3: could have

description: Discarded - should not be part of the delivery
name: prio 4: wont have

description: Unplanned work - task made up on-the-go
name: type: ad hoc

description: A customer facing bug - a patch bump
name: type: bug fix

description: The type of choice for smaller chunks of work distilled from bigger chunks - essentially a back-stop
name: type: dev task

description: Refactoring tasks, aiming for status quo, only prettier
name: type: refactoring

description: A feature is added to the system - a minor bump
name: type: feature

description: Defined broadly as a task dealing with IaC, flow tech, pipelines, tools, utilities, containers(etc)
name: type: infrastructure

description: Regular planned development work, part of a strict prioritized upstream kanban cycle
name: development

description: Ad hoc work, not part of a strict planned updstream kanban cycle
name: ad hoc

description: Rework of existing code; may or may not be part of a strict prioritized upstream kanban cycle
name: rework

description: Regular planned development work, part of a strict prioritized upstream kanban cycle
name: type: development
